name: RemotePasswordSafe
short_description:
RemotePasswordSafe is a client/server version of the PasswordSafe application. As it is predecessor I have been very concerned on security: it uses key pairs and passphrase on everything and the information is stored encrypted so if you forget the passphrase you lose your data, as PasswordSafe does.
It currently runs on GoogleApplicationEngine only but it should not be difficult to run it on any other JDBC because the persistence is done with JDO.
There is only one client: Win32 but as it is coded with SWT it will be a MacOS X client soon. I plan to develop another client for Android but not yet.
